a person who follows or belongs to a religion based on the worship of one God and the teachings of Jesus Christ as described in the Bible: The Roman Catholic Church is the largest of the Christian churches.
following or belonging to the Christian religion
If you describe a person or a person’s actions as Christian, you mean that he or she acts according to Christian principles of goodness and kindness toward others: It wasn’t very Christian of you to make him walk home in this rain.
